desc: Here at Turkish Carpets Inc., we specialize in a variety of Oushak rugs and Kilim rugs, including shag rugs, wool rugs and sisal rugs. Whether you need a high-end area rug or a brand-new runner rug, we are here to assist you with our 30 years of experience. Free shipping and a no hassles return policy!

layout.text: A Beautiful Home Begins with a Beautiful Rug
Click below to browse our collection of oriental rugs today!
